LanguageData.GlassEye.label: glass eye
LanguageData.GlassEye.description: An installed glass eye. Prettier than eye patches.
LanguageData.ArtificialNose.label: artificial nose
LanguageData.ArtificialNose.description: An installed artificial nose. Covers the hole in the face.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHand.label: simple prosthetic hand
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticHand.description: An installed prosthetic hand. Way more comfortable and less frightening than the hook hand.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFoot.label: simple prosthetic foot
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticFoot.description: An installed prosthetic foot. Not as cheap as a wood log.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticLeg.label: simple prosthetic leg
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticLeg.description: An installed prosthetic leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticArm.label: simple prosthetic arm
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticArm.description: An installed prosthetic arm. Simple but durable arm prosthesis.
LanguageData.ArtificialPelvis.label: artificial pelvis
LanguageData.ArtificialPelvis.description: An installed artificial pelvis. Pretty useful if crawling is not your favourite kind of moving around.
